title: Troping Through the Snow
description: The best thing about romance is falling in love with your favorite trope. That’s why we’ve created the town of Troping, where there’s love for everyone.Grab the complete Troping Through the Snow bundle with a Surprise Brand New Novella and FOUR Bonus Epilogues – one for each book in the series!This bundle includes Brother’s Best Enemy, The Cozy Agreement, Blackmailed by the Grump, Forbidden Stranger, Stalking the Secret Baby, AND a BRAND NEW Surprise Novella: Finding My Best Friend’s Daughter.Finding My Best Friend’s DaughterLuna thought Ryder left her forever, but the whole time he was working his way back to her. Now that he’s home for good all he’s got to do is hunt her down and make her his.
author: Alexa Riley
